top_comment.text:
The NRA and Gun advocates worry about so called losing gun rights and the 
2nd Amendment... which has not happened... and won't despite the rantings 
of Fox News. What you should be screaming about is this. The reality is: No 
one is coming to take your guns... However the Government is taking away 
your 1st, 4th and 14th constitutional rights... and doing it with zeal. 
We call this a 4th Quarter Razzle Dazzle Flea Flicker Play...﻿
top_comment.author: Robbie Adams

comments.text:
+Robbie Adams what's scary is this has been happening since the 50's in 
ever increasing power grabs. It wasn't till the 80's that we truly caught 
on and now its beyond control. Hell our government getting caught illegally 
violating wire tap laws and trying to muscle the press... They know what's 
happening or did everyone not see the speech from Obama saying not to 
listen to anyone but the government and anyone who disagrees with him would 
be put on the "watch list" as potential terrorists... Barack Obama Speech 
Dares Graduates to Reject Cynical Voices - Ohio State University 
Commencement. Or Obama to Ohio State Grads: Reject Voices Warning of 
Government Tyranny Isn't that sweet and Hitler like... Free people don't 
have the right to disagree with the government and if we do we are 
terrorists, just fucking pathetic in my humble opinion.
comments.author: C. Anthony Esposito II

comments.text: The patriot act and NDAA: Scary
comments.author: Robbie Adams

comments.text:
+Bobby Frazier we've lost more then that even earlier actually, like 
perhaps Clinton deregulating the banking that gave us the longest largest 
middle class growth in our history allowing the corrupt bankers to take 
over and creating money for laws we see today, or Bush Sr. Attacking Iraq 
to control the oil... Honestly, the corruption exploded during the Carter 
administration we became partially aware with the Iran contraband issue 
durning Reagan administration... But the total collapse was the patriot act 
and honestly it would take weeks to go over all of it.
comments.author: C. Anthony Esposito II

comments.text:
+C. Anthony Esposito II That's what I want to hear from MORE Americans! 
What you posted is 100% correct.
comments.author: Robbie Adams

comments.text:
+Bobby Frazier Just to interject as an American, no fucking way are we 
prepared to loose any of our rights. The government is acting on its own 
and no longer puts the issues to the people. We as Americans are trying to 
get this corrected without violence, without rebellion. What foreigners are 
seeing is sadly not actually what's happening with the people. We want our 
rights all of them, we are tired of the government punishing us for 
miniscule things while violating every law and every right we have. We the 
people, want peace, we the people want our freedom, we the people want our 
rights. All I ask before stereotyping the people of America on the actions 
of our government is to know the people. Most of us are good people worth 
knowing...
comments.author: C. Anthony Esposito II

comments.text:
+Bobby Frazier Bush and Obama are one of the same. Republicans 
and Democrats are one of the same when it comes to this area. It's SHOCKING 
that the Government is getting away with this...and doing it right in the 
open and yet all you hear about is this phantom war against gun rights...A 
war that does not exist...
comments.author: Robbie Adams

comments.text:
+John Magnus Steffensen You go it. The 2nd Amendment is the sacred cow, the 
bible, Jesus Christ and God and Scripture all rolled into one. DON'T TOUCH 
THAT! But all the other rights? You don't hear the far right or 
NRA screaming about those....

"Don't take my GUNS!!!
But you can detain me without trails... without warrants... Search me and 
my home and arrest me without due process... Lock me 
up indefinitely without consultation from lawyers....BUT DON'T TOUCH MY 
GUNS!!!! That's SACRED!!!"

*FACEPALM*
comments.author: Robbie Adams

comments.text:
+Bobby Frazier You nailed it. It's the prefect Flea Flicker Play to get 
Americans to look the other way while they gut the other parts of 
the Constitution.
Between the Patriot Act and the NDAA, Americans are getting screwed and 
seem to believe this phantom rant that the Government is coming for your 
guns.. They're not coming for your guns...they are taking away your other 
rights...and those same people screaming about the sacred cow 2nd 
amendment, don't scream about losing the other rights. How's that for 
screwy?
comments.author: Robbie Adams

comments.text:
From Europe it seems like Americans are prepared to loose fck all but the 
2nd ammendment.
comments.author: John Magnus Steffensen
